data.title: Wax, Facial & Deep Tissue Massage
data.text: Lovely ecperience, reasonably priced and very thorough. Adrienna (Nana) is a very skilled masseuse and facial expert. Using a very nice herbal steam, she scrubbed, toned and moisturized for 45 minutes. I was absolutely selighted.

data.title: Hair color
data.text: Professional staff. Great unique color mixes. Very little color fade and it's been over a month now. Also a full spa for some extra pampering.

data.title: Best massage experience ever.
data.text: Highly recommend it for back pain or stress relief. They have very well trained technicians for massages. And the customer service is impeccable. Try it when you are in the Weston Area. You will enjoy it as much as I did.

data.title: 1st class pampering
data.text:
While taking a break in Florida, and enjoying the weather, I became overwhelmed with jet lag and accumulated stress, evidence that I needed to start taking care of myself...

Then I found APPLEWOODS SPA, and got rejuvenated.  They took care of me, after a deep tissue massage and a bunch of papering, I felt refreshed and ready for my holiday...  

And I saved my golf game!

Definitely recommended, especially if you are staying in the area!
